issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

fields.summary: CacheDirective may invalidata,when NN restart or make a transition to Active.

comments.body: In other words,FSEditLog#logModifyCacheDirectiveInfo(directive, logRetryCache)  may serial a relative expiry time,But  FSImageSerialization#readCacheDirectiveInfo(DataInput in)  read it as a absolute expiryTime.
I will post a patch later.
